overview:
Flavius is an entrepreneur and a marketing professional who co-founded multiple IT companies:

Titan Backup was an easy-to-use solution for home and small offices, designed for secure backups of important data. In 2009 Titan Backup was acquired by GFI, provider of IT solutions for small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs).

Shelfster is a tool that provides an easy way to capture information from everywhere, have all the research materials in one place and create blog posts with them.

HoteloPro is a web-based hotel management software designed specifically for small and mid-size hotel units. HoteloPro allows hoteliers to manage everything: reservations, reports, invoicing, marketing campaigns from a carefully designed dashboard. HoteloPro addresses a market estimated to over 1.5 million small and mid-size hotels.

Mobiversal is a mobile app development agency with customers from US, UK, Israel, Austria, Belgium and Romania. The apps built by Mobiversal have been downloaded more than 500.000 times and received over 500 Five-Star ratings.
